title: For Other than Residential Development : The minimum width of internal road in any layout or subdivision of land shall be as given in Table No
clause_text: For Other than Residential Development : The minimum width of internal road in any layout or subdivision of land shall be as given in Table No.3B.
section: Roads / streets in Land Sub-division or Layout
